programme.desc: Adam learns the true meaning of "heavy" when he visits legendary heavy equipment manufacturer: John Deere. Then, we'll take a nostalgic look at where many fell in love with heavy machinery, TONKA TRUCKS! Plus, we get the inside scoop on massive mining machines that can skim mere inches or scour literal truckloads of material at a time.
